review.reviewBody: My granddaughters just love the Macaroni & Cheese - Medium 12" whenever they come to visit. Too bad this location did not have another favourite of theirs, Hot Dog Pizza(Large 14"), which I had to order from another Megabite location. Yup! grandma's aim to please :)
wing were soggy and gross..but pizza was delicious...

The rice was not the kind we oedered and the ribs had very little meat on them. 
It was better the ladt time we ordered them.
Its the  best pizza ive ever had
